text:
Hello Everyone,
Please help me to fix this issue:
I'm trying to submit an email which is created by custom module and drag and drop builder but while submitting it is showing an error message
Hi Shelly, I have messaged you directly, please see.

<@UFE1D9UU8>
Please change Custom Module Default Icon
See Attachment <https://prnt.sc/s380kc>

Hi everyone, I have a question regarding HubSpot CMS we are just in the in a planning proces of moving a WP site to HubSpot. And I can't wrap my head what would be the best way to build things like news,events,case studies things that require a listing page and a detail page. One thing that comes to my mind are blog categories but I think blog should only be used for blogging.

Hi Mitja,
We can use Blog or HubDB for these kind of pages.
Hmm the site already has a blog forgot to mention. I was aslo thinking of using HubDB but wouldn't that create a problem with adding new content ?
normally for news, events and case studies we create blog but HubDB also has richtext field which can be used for content and shouldn't be any problem.

You are right it has a rich text editor didn't know about just checked it :slightly_smiling_face: that opens up a solution. Still would not consider it to be the nicest thing to have for content editors. And creating one more blog and use it for news and events, case studies would be the other solution I gues. Thank you for your answer.
